item.title: Truncated Pages
item.description: Not too long ago I mentioned that I’d setup and installed Nginx on this server. All seemed well to start off with, then on certain occasions I started to notice that some pages were being served truncated while I was at work. I thought that the issue was work-related, as they have a fairly draconian security policy in place and I thought that it had something to do with severing the connection.

item.title: The Admin is an Idiot
item.description:
Yes, and that admin is me!

I usually do a fairly decent job of keeping the server patched, up to date, and clean. Over the Xmas period where I wasn’t really looking at anything online, something went wrong.

I logged on this morning only to find that the server wasn’t responding. I could connect via SSH, but nothing was being served via HTTP. So I tried to reboot LiteSpeed to see if that would resolve it (as you do ;) ). The service stopped, but failed to restart!
